climb.usageMessage: The CLIMB command lets Lara climb up/on something in the scene. You won't be always able to climb: Lara need something to climb up/on to complete this action. You can climb in the scene using the command CLIMB [UP/ON] [SOMETHING]. Note: if you type and execute CLIMB without specific element, Lara won't complete the action.

come.usageMessage: The COME command lets Lara get off gently from high places. You won't be always able to come: Lara need something to come up/down to complete this action. Use the command COME [UP/DOWN] to . Note: if you type and execute COME, you will COME STRAIGHT by default.

examine.usageMessage: The EXAMINE action is useful to help you explore the scene or a particular item in the scene. You can examine the scene using simply EXAMINE. If you try to examine an item you don't have in your pocket, the examine action will fail and nothing happens. You can examine an item using the command EXAMINE [ITEM_NAME] with the name of an item in the scene.

get.usageMessage: The GET action is used to get an item from the scene. If there are no items in the scene, nothing will be added to your pocket. You can get an item using the command GET [ITEM_NAME] with the name of an item in the scene.

jump.usageMessage: The JUMP command lets Lara jump into the scenario. If Lara is not stucked by something in the scene, or there's any reason why she can not move, you will be always able to jump. The jump command automatically setup the number of steps needed and eventually let Lara hang on the edge. You can jump in a specific direction in the scene using the command JUMP [STRAIGHT/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT]. Note: if you type and execute JUMP, you will JUMP STRAIGHT by default.

run.usageMessage: The RUN command lets Lara moving fast in the scene. If Lara is not stucked by something in the scene, or there's any reason why she can not move, you will be always able to run. You can move in a specific direction in the scene using the command RUN [STRAIGHT/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT]. Note: if you type and execute RUN, you will RUN STRAIGHT by default.

save.usageMessage: The SAVE action is used to save the game. You can save the game only when you meet a SAVE DIAMOND in the scene, using the command SAVE.

use.usageMessage: The USE action is used to use an item you hold. If you can't use the item in the scene than the item will remain in your pocket. You can use an item using the command USE [ITEM_NAME] with the name of an item in the scene.

walk.usageMessage: The WALK command lets Lara moving slow into the scenario. If Lara is not stucked by something in the scene, or there's any reason why she can not move, you will be always able to walk. You can move in a specific direction in the scene using the command WALK [STRAIGHT/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT]. Note: if you type and execute WALK, you will WALK STRAIGHT by default.

defaultMessages.default: You can't do this right now.

noCome: It is not the right thing to do...
noExamine: It is not the right thing to do...

cave.levelDescription: Welcome to Tomb Raider I. You will interprete the role of Lara, a British archaeologist and treasure hunter, most commonly known for her discovery of several noted artefacts, including Excalibur, the fabled sword of King Arthur. You was hired by Jacqueline Natla to travel to the Andes mountain range, in Peru, in search of an artefact known as the Scion, which rests in the Tomb of Qualopec somewhere in the mountains. Accompanied by a guide you arrived at a huge pair of stone doors, the entrance to an ancient Incan civilisation. You climbed to the top of the doors and found a hidden switch that opens the doors. A pack of ferocious wolves suddenly attacked you from inside the cave. You leaped to the ground, killing the wolves in a barrage of pistol fire. However, you are too late, and your guide is dead in the snow. Alone, you headed into the caves in search for the village Vilcabamba.

10.stepDescription: Run ahead to where the footprints come from

20.stepDescription: You will soon come to a part with slots in the wall

40.stepDescription: Run quickly past and try not to get hit

50.stepDescription: Follow the path to the right

60.stepDescription: There you can see the footprints coming down from the left

80.stepDescription: Do not turn left yet, but run into the cave ahead

90.stepDescription: In the left corner is a sloped block

100.stepDescription: Stand on the back of it

110.stepDescription: Jump up, hold on to the ledge and pull up

120.stepDescription: While sliding jump, press forward and grab the ledge

140.stepDescription: You will hear a sound indication that you've found the first secret

170.stepDescription: Leave the chamber again and backtrack to the place where the wolf tracks went upwards

190.stepDescription: At the crossing, three bats will attack you

220.stepDescription: Run into the left part of the cave

230.stepDescription: In the right corner is a snow-covered part of the wall on the left

240.stepDescription: This is where you can climb up to a higher level

250.stepDescription: Press up and action to do so

270.stepDescription: Then collect the next small medipack

280.stepDescription: Climb back down and return to the crossing

290.stepDescription: Run into the back of the cave

300.stepDescription: There is a path leading out and down to the left

340.stepDescription: Drop into the pit in the greenery and run down the stairs

350.stepDescription: There you'll find a door with a lever on the right

360.stepDescription: Use the lever to open the door

370.stepDescription: Enter the next chamber and shoot a bat

380.stepDescription: (On the right is a wooden gate, behind it you can see a trench on both sides lined with dart slots

390.stepDescription: ) Run into the left corner and climb up onto the next level

400.stepDescription: Follow the path till you come to a part of the cave with two bridges

410.stepDescription: Draw weapons and shoot the two wolves running around down there

420.stepDescription: Now run along to the right

430.stepDescription: (If you want to you can jump to the ground now and collect a small medipack, but we will come to that later

450.stepDescription: Run around the pillar and cross the second bridge

460.stepDescription: On the other side, turn left and enter the next room

480.stepDescription: Advance towards the gap on the right

490.stepDescription: In the chamber underneath is a bear hiding

500.stepDescription: (PlayStation users might want to save at the crystal on the opposite side, before going for the goodies

530.stepDescription: Kill the bear in the pit underneath

540.stepDescription: (It's possible that you will not be able to kill him from above, as he tries to hide

560.stepDescription: Enter the next room and shoot two bats

570.stepDescription: Run towards the strange looking platform on the floor

580.stepDescription: This is a trigger for the door

600.stepDescription: Then step onto the marked platform to open the door

610.stepDescription: (It's a timed door so you have to be quick

630.stepDescription: You'll end up in the cave with the bridges again

640.stepDescription: Turn right and run into the open

650.stepDescription: Run towards the skeleton statue on the right

670.stepDescription: You can also pull yourself up onto the second bridge

690.stepDescription: Run over the bridge again and jump over the pit where the bear was

700.stepDescription: Here the PlayStation users can save their game at the save crystal

710.stepDescription: Before you run down the stairs run behind the pillars on the left and collect a small medipack

730.stepDescription: Draw weapons and shoot the two wolves coming up the stairs

750.stepDescription: Run down and collect the small medipack lying underneath the stairs

770.stepDescription: Climb onto the platform in front of the closed gate

790.stepDescription: Make a running jump towards the green platform

830.stepDescription: Climb up onto the platform with the lever

850.stepDescription: It will open the big gate on the other platform

860.stepDescription: This gate is timed, so hurry

870.stepDescription: Turn to the left and standing jump onto the block between this platform and the one with the gate

890.stepDescription: Quickly run through the open gate

960.stepDescription: Shoot the wolf in the chamber at the top, on the left

970.stepDescription: Step onto the broken platform and drop through the Collapsible Floor

980.stepDescription: Turn right and run through the doorway

990.stepDescription: At the end, turn left and make a running jump over the gap

1020.stepDescription: Draw weapons and shoot the wolf

1040.stepDescription: Use the lever in the chamber the wolf came out of

1050.stepDescription: Return outside and go towards the first window on the right

1060.stepDescription: Slide down the hill and run through the open gate
